name: Chat Bot
message: Using chat bots in the lobby is not permitted.

name: Encouraging Bad Behavior
message: Encouraging others to break the rules is not allowed.

name: Server Advertisement
message: Please use the /ad command when advertising a Minehut server.

name: External Advertisement
message: Advertising external servers is not permitted in our lobby.

name: Spam
message: Spamming the lobby violates our rules.

name: Swearing
message: Swearing is against our rules, so is trying to bypass our chat filter.

name: Auto Ad
message: Using tools to automatically advertise is not allowed.

name: Harassment
message: Harassing other players and staff is not permitted.

name: Inappropriate Behavior
message: Inappropriate topics/words are not permitted in chat.

name: Staff Impersonation
message: Pretending to be Minehut or SLG staff is not allowed.

name: Discrimination
message: Using slurs and/or discriminating others is not allowed.

name: Abusing Support
message: Abusing Support or staff is not allowed.

name: Sending Malicious Links
message: Sharing malicious links that might install malware or collect personal information are not allowed.

name: Death Wishes/Self Harm Encouragement
message: Death wishes or encouraging self harm to others is not permitted.

name: Hacking/Backdoor Player Server
message: Using a tool or command block to hack a player server is not allowed.

name: Other 3mo
message: Your account has been banned, please contact Support for more info.

name: Community Disruption
message: Griefing player servers or causing disruptions in the community is not permitted.

name: Releasing Personal Info
message: Distributing any personal information, even if fake, is not permitted.

name: DDoS, Dox or Death Threats
message: Making any threats against Minehut, staff, or other players is not permitted.

name: Predatory Behavior/Explicit Content Predatory
message: Predatory behvior or sexual harassment of any kind is strictly prohibited.

name: Ban Evasion
message: Using other accounts to evade punishments is not allowed

name: Chargeback/Fraud Charges
message: Please contact customer support for more info: minehut.com/support

name: Inappropriate Name/Skin
message: Inappropriate usernames and skins are not permitted on our servers. Please change it and contact Support.

name: Other Perm
message: Your account has been banned, please contact Support for more info.

name: Under 13
message: Players using Minehut must be at least 13 years old.
